name: LOUISIANA
description: The Louisiana model offers 4 grand bedrooms and 3 full bathrooms. This statuesque home spans 3,277 sq/ft of meticulously designed flow space to satisfy the needs of the most discerning of clients. Light placement and vaulted ceilings have been engineered and thought through at the highest level to provide an energy efficient yet luxurious level of comfort to this estate. The kitchen space was designed with your family in mind, prepare to fall in love with our high end finishes! Feel the quality of the stone countertops, enjoy the smooth feeling of the soft close cabinetry. Let your eyes enjoy the sleek design of our all stainless modern appliances.
